name: Winter Coat
description: A warm and stylish winter coat designed to keep you cozy during cold seasons. Perfect for layering and protection against the chilly weather.

description: A sleek and warm men's winter jacket that offers great insulation and a modern fit. Ideal for everyday wear in colder months.

description: This cozy winter coat provides excellent warmth and comfort, featuring a soft inner lining and stylish outer design.

description: A warm fleece-lined coat designed to provide maximum insulation while maintaining a stylish and classic look.

name: Leather Winter Coat
description: A premium leather winter coat that combines warmth with sophistication. Perfect for making a fashion statement in cold weather.

description: Trendy and comfortable skinny jeans for kids, made with stretchable fabric for a perfect fit.
